amendment.description: To strike the provisions relating to nuclear energy innovation capabilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3404 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3404 proposed by Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S5219; text: CR S5219) To strike the provisions relating to nuclear energy innovation capabilities.
